author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_12_3_X`.

This is the PR for the `master` branch, which will then be backported to `12_4_X` and `12_3_X` (the latter is the release cycle currently used for HLT-menu development for Run 3).

Includes the integration of the following JIRA tickets.

  - [CMSHLT-2287](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2287): [TSG] New Stream for GPU-vs-CPU comparisons in DQM
  - [CMSHLT-2300](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2300): [TRK] Update "timeThreshold" parameter value for BeamSpot
  - [CMSHLT-2303](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2303): [TSG] Redefinition of split PDs for EphemeralPhysics and EphemeralZeroBias
  - [CMSHLT-2309](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2309): [EXO] Disable `HLT_PFMET1XX_PFJet100_looseRecoiling_v` triggers

The PR also includes a fix for the customisation function to run the latest HLT GRun menu on Run-2 data.

#### PR validation:

TSG tests.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: HLT menu development for `12_3_X` [`12_5_X`]
